title: Poppy's new ult is INSANE

embed.description: When I first saw her new ult this came to mind

body:
I mean, the trolls possible with {{champion:223}}  or even {{champion:429}}  maybe could be ~~ hilarious ~~  annoying

A **good gank** mid with her ult can also knock the enemy into your tower if they dont have {{summoner:4}} or any other escape / {{item:3157}}

replies.body:
My new dream situation:

I'm top Poppy, and my Jungle Vi starts raging at someone on my team.  Real toxic stuff.  Our first team fight starts, Vi engages with her ult, and I make sure she dives two towers.

Okay, I've done it myself, but still: I really wish people would quit characterizing every JUST-REVEALED feature in the most damning way possible based on a limited and possibly BS understanding of what the feature is:

* Characterizations scrounged up from minor glimpses of new features.
* Characterizations given within hours of preview-releases without people actually READING THE DESCRIPTIONS before developing an overwhelming confidence in the idea that a troll meme is warranted.

"A good gank mid with her ult can also knock the enemy into your tower". NO, IT CAN'T. Ditto on J Eevo's post.

Reread the ability

Poppy's new ult only punts the enemy IN THE DIRECTION OF HIS BASE (AS IN DELIVERS THEM TO SAFETY) No using it during a gank to set up a play unless you want to save your ally from death by making the enemy laner get out of the fight entirely.

It's why Poppy main's are crying out to the heavens that she's more of a tank support now than a fighter, with her ultimate being a peel, and her kit revolving around pushing people back and protecting the ADC.
